title: How to Make Honey Glazed Apples

steps.headline: Take a big platter and a big bowl.
Pour all the honey in the bowl.
Wash your apples and dry gently.
Place them on the platter side by side at the edge, forming a nice circle.
Take chocolate buttons and melt them using the stove.
steps.description: so that they become "WARM" and a chocolate mess!

steps.headline: Take some hard candy and crush it to pieces.place it in another bowl.
Dip the apples into the honey and leave them there for 10 minutes.
steps.description: slowly take out and wipe any extra honey.

steps.headline: Make a little hole inside the apple and pour the warm melted chocolate inside
Dip the apples in the crushed candy to cover up the apple in candy and also to heal the hole made.
Enjoy your delicious honey glazed apples!

Enjoy your delicious honey glazed apples!
